title: " Connection to spectator server failed "
body:
Hi everyone...
Here is the problem...ever since I installed the new Client I noticed that I can't spectate anymore.
Everytime I try to do so the screen gets black and this message pops out **" Connection to spectator server failed "**

I reinstalled the game, repaired it. Switched to the old Client, still the same. 
Downloaded even some files from OP.GG and Lolking and tried to spectate that way. Nothing works. 
Guys, its really really frustrating. It seems like there is no logical explanation for this problem. 

If anyone could help out with this, I'd be greatfull to you.

I'm curious if this is isolated to the updated client or a connection problem.  To help rule out possibilities, what happens if you try to specate on the legacy client?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Let me know what happens!

I am playing on the EUNE. I have tried for the last week to make this work, it wont let me spectate, not even my friends (my brother). It goes like this:
It tries to go in the game but then it says:

Cant connect to the spectate server > you can try again or leave > trying again > Unable to download spectator data, the game will now exit.

Goes back back to the Reconect and Quit choices. Recconecting just gives exact same results.

Fixes tried:
No connection issues at all to internet.
No firewall blocking etc.
Tried to run legacy client, just exits the launcher when I click the "yellow tect" and nothing happens.
Ran a full repair.
Run the HRT tool.

None of it helps.

Oh, I forgot to mention. I reinstalled the game, so now I only have the legacy client. Tried to spectate, same problem as before. 
And one small detail I forgot to say : I am only able to spectate until the champion select screen. Right after they finish banning and picking champions, the message " Connection to spectator server failed " pops out. 
I can try and take a picture if this might help.

I've investigated a bit further and wasn't able to discover any issues with spectating.  To help troubleshoot a bit more, run over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  This will help determine if there are local network issues failing to reach the server, which is why you would see these errors or even black screens.  Let me know if that helps!
